title: Nathaniel Metcalfe - The Resurrection! • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #193
itunes:title: Nathaniel Metcalfe - The Resurrection! • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #193
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! THE RESURRECTION! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with ace comic and writer NATHANIEL METCALFE!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! THE RESURRECTION!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with ace comic and writer NATHANIEL METCALFE!


A joyous resurrection with Brett and Nat, as the two catch up and check in once again in purgatory or limbo or the real world (take your pick) to talk all things existential and cinematic with a whole batch of new questions and gossip and secrets and everything else! Action packed from beginning to end, and what a treat to meet the guest who inspired one of the most loved (and not loved) questions of the podcast! Enjoy the newly resurrected Nathaniel and his guide Brett in a lovely new episode.
